imdb.plot outline: The business savvy Houston (Dexster Pressley) who is the owner of Tower of Seven and his stay at home wife Celine (Natalie Cooley) lives begin to change when they become connected to several individuals who represent the seven deadly sins Pride, Greed, Wrath, Envy, Sloth, Gluttony, and Lust. This connection causes a negative shift in their marriage and reveals some secrets from their past.
imdb.title: Deserted
plot: The lives of Houston and Celine begin to change when they become connected with other individuals who represent the seven deadly sins (Pride, Gluttony, Envy, Wrath, Greed, Sloth, and Lust).::Quentin Washington

The business savvy Houston (Dexster Pressley) who is the owner of Tower of Seven and his stay at home wife Celine (Natalie Cooley) lives begin to change when they become connected to several individuals who represent the seven deadly sins Pride, Greed, Wrath, Envy, Sloth, Gluttony, and Lust. This connection causes a negative shift in their marriage and reveals some secrets from their past.::Quentin Washington
